name: Soulsborne Play Test v2
description:
Currently working on this project where all the Soulsborne games are thrown together. This is only a rough version of the first level and boss.

Only one class is available right now: The Knight.

Vagabond, Cleric and Magician are planned.

You can only fight one boss and three enemies right now, but there are 21 more bosses and 23 enemies in the game that are ready to be placed.

There are also 26 Weapons, 27 Spells, 31 Pieces of Armor, 10 Rings in total.

I feel like that's a good amount but I might add one or two more.

I also plan to add multiple voice acted NPC's with quest lines. Unknown how many as of now.

Any feedback would be appreciated!

Thanks for taking your time to play this.
